extendedInfo.description: Featured by Google in "Play Picks"!The acclaimed action puzzle platform game is available on Android for phones and tablets! From the creator of hits Finger Balance and iDragPaper. Reviews: "Itâs got great gameplay, a huge amount of variety in the level of design, a catchy soundtrack, and beautiful artwork. This is one game thatâs guaranteed to keep you busy all weekend.â -- GameTrailers"One Tap Hero is a valiant attempt to do something different with the platform genre, and it just about manages to pull it off.â -- PocketGamer (Silver Awards)"One Tap Hero should be on the top of your download list. Hit that download button right now!" -- androidshock"One Tap Hero is an intelligent game that does what it claims, blending the genre of platform and puzzler well." -- 148Apps 4.5/5"It's precision platforming at its best, with enough charm and ingenuity to win over even the most jaded mobile gamer." -- Modojo 4.5/5Features:Platforming has never felt so simpleâ¦An evil wizard has turned your sweetheart into a teddy bear and the only way to save her is to collect stars and use their power to change her back. Time for a top tapping adventure!â¢ TAP IT Controls couldn't be simpler. Just tap to jump, tap to climb ladders, tap toâ¦do pretty much everything! With these super simple controls this platforming game becomes all about timing and foresight! â¢ WONDERFUL WORLDSYour adventure will take you to four unique game worlds, each with their own challenges and elements from portals to switches and more! Collect keys along your way to unlock bonus levels.â¢ RELAXINGSit back and relax with the soothing, melodic soundtrack and sound FX in One Tap Hero. It's perfect for a 5 minute blast or a long gaming session!Interesting characters and items are available in the in-game store.Accolades:â¢ Finalist of Indie Game Festival Chinaâ¢ Selected Project of Game Connectionâ¢ Metacritic's score 84 and 10 best Games for August 2012!â¢ TouchArcade's Best Games of August 2012â¢ PocketGamer's top 10 best one-button gamesFollow us on Twitter @Coconut_Islandhttp://twitter.com/Coconut_IslandLike us on Facebookhttp://www.facebook.com/OneTapHero

reviews.title: Great and fun!
